name: Age of Empires III
description:
Age of Empires III is a strategy game developed by Ensemble Studios. It came out on 18-10-2005. Microsoft Studios published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Age of Empires III on PC.
It was produced by David Holmes, David Rippy and Phil Spencer. Graeme Devine, Sandy Petersen and Tony Goodman directed the game. David Rippy, Kevin McMullan and Stephen Rippy scored the game.
